answers.answer: I never felt a flutter (at least I didn't know if I did) until 18 weeks I felt the first kick.
I first felt my baby boy kick at 19 weeks I'm 22 weeks now and they get stronger each day.
Normally I'll fell a pain here and there or flutters every day but I have been stressed and I haven't felt nothing at all for days
My baby hates orange juice makes my stomach feelweird

I felt flutters ar like 16 weeks for a couple days and it completely went away. Now i am 19 weeks tomorrow and feel baby kicking every day! ;) my doctor told me at thia stage its nothing to worry about if u dont feel baby all the time
What do flutters feel like ? There was one day were I kept feeling like bubbles in my lower stomach. It wasn't gas. But could that be it ?
Ive been feeling flutters since week 17 now at week 22 i feel solid kicks and hiccups

I'm 18 weeks and my baby rolls now and kicks I can feel it more and more every day if your a first time mom you might not get strong movements until 20 weeks the doctor gave my mom Apple juice to wake the baby during her check ups and it worked every time due to the sugar content orange juice actually lowers your sugar that's why for diabetes you put sugar in the oj it balances it so you don't have a spike in sugar levels if your low.
Tljw.. bubbles is what my flutters felt like as well! It was the only way i could describe it!
This is my second pregnancy. I love the feeling of flutters lol

question: 4 going into 5 months ? Has anybody felt anything because normally I fell flutters.ill be 5 months in a week
title: flutters?
